title: CK TTT Watch
description: A watch face will display your HH:MM in Tic-Tac-Toe Cipher format on your Android Wear device.The mobile application will show you how to decode the display time.The wear application will display the current encoded time in Ambient mode. In Interactive mode, user can choose to display normal time, date and battery level
descriptionHTML:
A watch face will display your HH:MM in Tic-Tac-Toe Cipher format on your Android Wear device.

The mobile application will show you how to decode the display time.
The wear application will display the current encoded time in Ambient mode. In Interactive mode, user can choose to display normal time, date and battery level
recentChanges: - Convert to proper Android Watch Face API
- Show in Encoded time when in Ambient Mode
- In Interactive Mode, user can choose to display Encoded or normal time
- In Interactive Mode, user can choose to display date or battery level
